actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, to help small businesses by providing a corporate tax exemption on the first $100,000 of taxable income.

summary.text: Increases, from $25,000 to $100,000 the exemption from corporate income tax for small businesses under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 11)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, to help small businesses by providing a corporate tax exemption on the first $100,000 of taxable income.
